name: Rabby's Middle School
description:
Choose your own adventure game about a pure fictional story which is not based on my middle school at all. If you play with Chinglish as your language please bear with my terrible English cause me English bad.

In the current version of the game, the option to leave the village is not available, yet.

Thank you for playing the game. (I don't know why would anyone wants to play this game though it's so terrible.)
